message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that amount for it.
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $95 for the product. It's a fair price, and I'm willing to compromise.

I understand that you're trying to compromise, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more offer to try to meet in the middle. I'll offer it to you for $100. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price for the product.
